title: Giro d'Italia fantasy league with Scorito and Rouleur
content:
The Giro d’Italia gets underway in Turin on Saturday and we have teamed up with Scorito to form the Rouleur Fantasy League. And it's free to play.

Know your Bernals from your Landas? Is Vlasov worth a punt, or Pogacar a safer bet? Could Evenepoel be in decent shape, or twice former winner Nibali for that matter?

You’ll have a €47 million budget to play with for your 20-man squad. It may sound like a whole heap of money, but splash out on a Roglic and a Thomas and before you know it, the pot is running low. Don’t forget those domestiques, sprinters and TT specialists to form a well-rounded squad.

Giro d'Italia 2021 Preview

Sniffing out bargains is key. Studying the parcours is crucial. Your team captain for every stage scores double points, so choose wisely.

Can you beat Rouleur’s so-called experts? We’ll be awarding prizes each Sunday to the league leader to give a little extra motivation to you managers, and an extra fat award to the league’s overall winner on the final day in Milan. And, unlike the actual Giro winner, you won’t have to share it with eight team-mates...

Download the Scorito app for mobiles, or use the computer and tablet version.

You have until lunchtime Saturday 8th to get involved. Vai vai!
author: Miles Baker-Clarke
